Sentencas: High temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) offer a clean, pollution-free technology to electrochemically generate electricity at high efficiencies.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: These fuel cells provide many advantages over traditional energy conversion systems including high efficiency, reliability, modularity, fuel adaptability, and very low levels of NOx and SOx emissions.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: Furthermore, because of their high temperature of operation (similar to 1000 degreesC), natural gas fuel can be reformed within the cell stack eliminating the need for an expensive, external reformer.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: Also, pressurized SOFCs can be successfully used as replacements for combustors in gas turbines; such hybrid SOFC-gas turbine power systems are expected to reach efficiencies over 70%.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: This paper reviews the materials and fabrication methods used for the different cell components, and discusses the performance of cells fabricated using these materials; it also discusses the materials and processing studies that are under investigation to reduce the cell cost.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: Finally, the paper summarizes the recently built power generation systems that employed state-of-the-art SOFCs.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology

Sentencas: A new design SOFC that combines the seal-less feature of tubular cells and a flattened air electrode with integral ribs is also described; this new design has a shortened current path and hence lower cell resistance and higher power output than tubular cells.
Titulo: Advances in solid oxide fuel cell technology
